title: Adobe Primetime Authentication ExperienceEvent Extension
description: Adobe Primetime Authentication extension to ExperienceEvent.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/primetim.title: Primetime Event Type
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/primetim.description: Unique identifier for the event type generated by Primetime Authentication services.

meta:enum.authenticationAttempt: The user started the authentication flow
meta:enum.authenticationGranted: The user has authenticated successfully and an authentication token was created
meta:enum.authorizationGranted: The authorization for specified resources was granted
meta:enum.authorizationDenied: The authorization for specified resources was denied
meta:enum.profileUpdated: The user profile information was updated
meta:enum.logoutAttempt: The user started log out flow
meta:enum.logoutCompleted: The user was successfully log out
meta:enum.mediaTokenGranted: The media token needed for playback was granted

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/primetim.title: Primetime SSO Type
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/primetim.description: Unique identifier for the sso type mechanism used Primetime Authentication services.

meta:enum.adobe: The Single Sign On flow was provided through Adobe services
meta:enum.platform: The Single Sign On flow was provided through specific platform services
meta:enum.passive: The Single Sign On flow was provided through passive authentication

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/primetim.title: End User metadata
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/primetim.description: End User metadata received from MVPDs.
